description: Housed in an elegant period building in the historic centre, this restaurant is run by a friendly couple, with the wife at the helm in the kitchen and the husband keeping a skilful eye on the front-of-house staff. Highlights on the menu include pumpkin tortelli and rose tart with Muscat zabaglione.
